comments.text:
Created attachment 518106
Screenshot

The :onhover images on https://donate.mozilla.org/page/contribute/protect-the-web#act-3 looks hazy; see screenshot.
comments.raw_text: The :onhover images on https://donate.mozilla.org/page/contribute/protect-the-web#act-3 looks hazy; see screenshot.
comments.creator: stephen.donner@gmail.com
comments.author: stephen.donner@gmail.com

comments.raw_text:
The haziness is caused by Firefox (or the browser's) graphic engine. In this case, the transform is being performed on-the-fly and we can't control how it looks, ultimately.

If this is a blocker we can remove the treatment. It was added a nice 'experience enhancement'.
